name: FishQuest (millercs)
description:
FishQuest is the spiritual successor to BirdQuest. Instead of identifying all of the birds, you're tasked with catching all of the fish.

The actual catching mechanics are not difficult. This is a challenge for your brain, not your hands. You will have to optimize the buying of foods and the selling of fish to succeed. 

Known Issues:

  • The ? Menu in the battle scenario isn't layered correctly - will be overhauled entirely with different text eventually. 
  • Too much mouse movement, should implement some keyboard controls to save wrists. 
  • Scoring system not thoroughly tested don't get mad at me if it says you didn't do a good job. 

Credits:

  • Simple Slide Menu
  • Art Assets & Font
